label: Ramos-Tafur, Gabriel E. & Rafael Lemaitre.  2017. A new species of shrimp of the genus Periclimenaeus Borradaile, 1915  (Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) from the southeastern Gulf of Mexico, including a key to the western Atlantic species of the genus . Zootaxa 4303(4): 491–508.
